basics.name: Marouen Helali
basics.label: Site Reliability Engineer
basics.summary:
I currently work as a Site Reliability Engineer at Bayer.
 I used to work at Centene Corporation where I gathered experience as a Full-Stack Software and Web Developer.
 I graduated from Lindenwood University in 3 years with a 4.0 GPA accompanied by University Honors.
 Double majored in Computer Science and Mathematics. My proudest academic achievements were the Hackathons I participated in, along with the Audience Choice Award I received for my Quantum Computing Research. 
My proudest non-academic achievement is the creation and launch of an open source community driven initiative in order to help combat misinformation about Covid-19 called covid-helpline.com

work.summary: Work with distributed systems and databases. Build and operate fault-tolerant, distributed, cloud-based systems. Design, build, and operate Big Data, stream processes, and/or enterprise data integration solutions, Make use of container technologies (Docker), service orchestration and micro services architectures, Implement monitoring and logging to our platforms

I worked within the CAPI team as a full stack developer. I created, developed, maintained, and scaled angular applications as my front-end work, while using Golang and MongoDB to accomplish back-end tasks. I also focused on catching up with our technological debt by writing unit and integration tests. I got to use many new libraries and learn awesome industry-level concepts and skills such as containerization and container management using Docker and Kubernetes.
Started my first professional developer experience as a Backend Developer for Asseco PST
Moved to Prague, Czech Republic to intern for the European Commission helping them build one of the biggest european projects, Galileo Satellite System

My first real work experience. Interning as an IT Support Technician I was able to learn and explore way more than the workings of a big IT Infrastructure. I got to work with PowerShell scripting, PHP and email marketing.
